forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 61. West wind 16 to 26 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind 20 to 26 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun stretches over Downtown San Francisco, an ethereal light dances through the urban landscape, inviting a serene morning stroll amidst the gentle rustle of the wind. With a high expected near 61 degrees, warmth is fleeting yet comforting. The westward gusts, twisting and twirling at 16 to 26 mph, carry whispers of the Pacific, reminding us of the city’s indelible union with its maritime surroundings. Though the promise of sunshine is clear, a slight haze suggests the presence of lingering fog somewhere along the shores, perhaps draping softly over the Golden Gate, a reminder of the ocean’s mystique.

As day weaves into night, clouds will pepper the sky in a casual display, ushering in a low of around 52 degrees. The brisk winds are set to linger, maintaining their steady presence and hinting at the cool embrace of evening. It’s a day where layering becomes a delightful necessity; a light jacket or cozy wrap would serve well, offering both comfort and versatility as one meanders through the city. This is a perfect day to explore local cafes for a warm drink or indulge in the captivating aromas of the Ferry Building Marketplace. Alternatively, a leisurely walk along the Embarcadero could unveil the subtle charm of a city in its most relaxed state, beckoning one to appreciate the uncomplicated beauty of the everyday.
